actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to reduce the cost of the program of aid to families with dependent children by providing for payments to certain private programs that are able to provide such families with employment and other assistance at a savings to the Federal Government.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act to provide for payments to certain qualified private aid programs which offer low-income individuals employment and other assistance.

titles.title: To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to reduce the cost of the program of aid to families with dependent children by providing for payments to certain private programs that are able to provide such families with employment and other assistance at a savings to the Federal Government.
